long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost your productivity by highlighting multiple search words / phrases of your choice in plain-text log or text files, e.g. server log files.

The extension allows multiple search words / phrases / regular expressions to be specified and saved via the Options page of the extension. Overlapping matches are supported as well such that the largest continuous matching chunk is highlighted in one color (e.g. when searching for "man" and "nor" and the text contains "manor", "manor" will be highlighted with one color).

Once applied the original HTML is modified internally. To reset the original formatting just reload the page itself.

Please see the homepage for more details.
